event.title: made of Yiwu and Dongyang cities, was home to 2,038,413 inhabitants at the 2010

data.event: Its built-up (or metro) area, made of Yiwu and Dongyang cities, was home to 2,038,413 inhabitants at the 2010 census.
In 2005, the city's GDP reached 15.984 billion RMB yuan, earning fiscal revenue of 1.38 billion RMB yuan.
